wikipedia_page.main: Alexandra Anastasia Hamilton, Duchess of Abercorn,  (née Phillips; 27 February 1946 – 10 December 2018), was a philanthropist, an aristocrat of Russian descent and the wife of The 5th Duke of Abercorn.

response: While in school, Sharkey was the recipient of a Pushkin prize for poetry. The Pushkin Prizes were established in 1987 by Sacha Hamilton, Duchess of Abercorn, to commemorate the 150th anniversary of the death of her ancestor, Alexander Pushkin. The poetry prize was awarded annually to school aged children.
* Sacha Hamilton, Duchess of Abercorn (1946–2018), wife of the 5th Duke
